active.name: Wall Walk
active.effects: Become ghostly for 6 seconds, ignoring terrain collision until you basic attack or cast an ability. While inside terrain, gain {{as|300 '''bonus''' movement speed}}.

effects_structured.raw: Become ghostly for 6 seconds, ignoring terrain collision until you basic attack or cast an ability. While inside terrain, gain {{as|300 '''bonus''' movement speed}}.
